As Flicker enters the upper atmosphere he uses downwards thrusters to 
slow his descent and keep the shuttle from becoming a clearly visable 
meteorite.  When it finally hits he kicks his feet up on the counsole 
and waits watching his scanners.

Flicker:  Looks like Megatron is in a battle right now.  I don't want 
to get involved this early on.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Another shuttle crosses through the portal (or whatever the dang 
> thing is).  It is twice the size of most shuttles, but most of it's 
> mass is filled with cargo, from energon cubes (probably not needed) 
> to shield generators, to ammo (happy now).  Only one bot is on 
> board.  He sits at the control, his demeanor quiet, and 
contemplating 
> as he heads towards Earth.
> 
> He scans the planet and sees the Predicon frequency.
> 
> Bot:  I knew I'd find Megatron here when the portal opened.  This 
was 
> the only logical place for him to go.  Too bad he seems to have 
> started the party without me, but maybe I can still help him with 
> those Autobot hero wanna bes.
> 
> He turns his shuttle to land close to a hundred miles from the 
> Predicon base.
> 
> Bot:  Soon the Maximals will feel the wrath of Flicker.
